name: Propulsion - Retro Space Adventure Game
description:
Propulsion is a space action game for the lovers of the space games. All you need is to take your ship through infinite space and avoiding asteroids in the sky. Your airplane is a shooter and can destroy the small asteroids and divides big ones into smaller to further destroy them. You need to apply some force on your mobile/tablet screen to propel you rocket.

You have certain power ups to use in the game. There is a “Coins Rain” power-up which make more coins appear and an extractor to extract all the nearby coins. Also use a shield and a gun to make your plane a battleship. You can blast the rocks with bullets fire.

It is an endless game in an infinite space.
